title: Most shazamed songs of all time worldwide 2018
summary: This statistic presents the Number of identifications millions in the most popular Song worldwide in 2018 .
Wake_Me_Up_by_Avicii had the largest Number of identifications millions in 2018 with 23.77 millions .
In 2018 , Wake_Me_Up_by_Avicii had the second most identifications millions .

data.Song Titles: Somebody That I Used To Know by Gotye feat. Kimbra
Lean On by Major Lazer Feat. MØ & DJ Snake
Thinking Out Loud by Ed Sheeran
Blurred Lines by Robin Thicke T.I. and Pharrell
Take Me To Church by Hozier
Rather Be by Clean Bandit feat. Jess Glynne
All of Me by John Legend

gold: This statistic shows the most popular songs on Shazam ever worldwide as of August 2018 , ranked by the number of identifications.
As of that month , the music identification app had identified the song Wake Me Up by Avicii almost 23.8 million times , making it the most shazamed song in history .
